official_title: To extend the benefits of the weatherization assistance program under part A of title IV of the Energy Conservation and Production Act to Puerto Rico and the United States Virgin Islands.

summary.text: Amends the Energy Conservation and Production Act to extend the low-income weatherization assistance program to Puerto Rico and the United States Virgin Islands.

titles.title: To extend the benefits of the weatherization assistance program under part A of title IV of the Energy Conservation and Production Act to Puerto Rico and the United States Virgin Islands.
